channel.title: Comments on: HAITI
channel.description: Because in all fairness, there is enough...

item.title: By: plentyinternational
item.dc:creator: plentyinternational
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/haiti/#comment-11">meadde</a>.
<a href="http://www.bumisehatbali.org/" rel="nofollow">Bumi Sehat</a>, a women's clinic in Jacmel, Haiti. <a href="http://www.whirlwindwheelchair.org/" rel="nofollow">Whirlwind Wheelchairs International</a> is bringing in much-needed rugged terrain wheelchairs. These are two small groups already on the ground in Haiti that Plenty is helping to support.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to meadde.

Bumi Sehat, a women’s clinic in Jacmel, Haiti. Whirlwind Wheelchairs International is bringing in much-needed rugged terrain wheelchairs. These are two small groups already on the ground in Haiti that Plenty is helping to support.

item.title: By: meadde
item.dc:creator: meadde
item.description: Can you give me the names of the organizations (small, on the ground as mentioned above) or is it better to go through Plenty. am in small community in Northern CA and we want to be sure our donations go directly and quickly to a grass roots organization. WE are interested in helping with orphans, water, shelter..immediate needs. We are meeting tomorrow so it would be great if you could tell me a bit about the Orgs. you are in touch with. Deborah Mead Thank you for your work
item.content:encoded:
Can you give me the names of the organizations (small, on the ground as mentioned above) or is it better to go through Plenty. am in small community in Northern CA and we want to be sure our donations go directly and quickly to a grass roots organization. WE are interested in helping with orphans, water, shelter..immediate needs. We are meeting tomorrow so it would be great if you could tell me a bit about the Orgs. you are in touch with.
Deborah Mead
Thank you for your work
